text: Arne Georg Fredrik Weise (28 February 1930 – 25 September 2019) was a Swedish journalist and television personality. He was known as one of SVT's most famous broadcasters.Arne Weise" (in Swedish). Swedish Film Institute. Retrieved 25 September 2019 He worked at Sveriges Radio from 1952 and started working for SVT in 1979. He was born in Malmö. On 25 September 2019, Weise died in his sleep, at the age of 89. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Swedish journalists Category:Swedish television personalities Category:Swedish radio personalities
title: Arne Weise
